name: S5P_L2_AER_AI_NRTI
title: Sentinel5P - Level-2 Ultra violet aerosol index
description: Aerosol index with a spatial resolution of 5.5Ã—3.5km2 observed from spectra measured by TROPOMI

bands.name: aerosol_index_335_367
bands.common_name: UV aerosol index from 367 and 335 nm (unitless)
bands.description: The Aerosol Index (AI) is a qualitative index indicating the presence of elevated layers of aerosols in the atmosphere. It can be used to detect the presence of UV absorbing aerosols such as desert dust and volcanic ash plumes. Positive values (from light blue to red) indicate the presence of UV-absorbing aerosol.
